alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Grady; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 10 at 3:13PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Florida and Georgia, including the following areas, in Florida, Coastal Franklin, Coastal Gulf, Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Wakulla, Gadsden, Inland Franklin, Inland Gulf, Inland Jefferson, Inland Wakulla, Leon, Liberty and Madison. In Georgia, Berrien, Brooks, Colquitt, Cook, Grady, Lanier, Lowndes and Thomas. * WHEN...Through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Several rounds of moderate to heavy rainfall are expected through Saturday night. Additional rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches with isolated heavier totals of up to 6 inches are expected, This could lead to flash flooding and rises on area rivers and streams. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Grady; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas
